description: Jesus at center, praying, leaning on a rock, with an angel in front of him carrying a cross and a goblet; three sleeping figures at left
inscription:

on back of mount, in pencil: [12 x 16 / 1/8\" float of drawing only]
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk with white heightening on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, March 13, 1975, no. 243, for Â£50 to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Agony in the Garden
